ygData.subject: Re: Recovering Rodimus/BlackFortress
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson nodds.  And for the first time, even though he could not see from his eyes, it appears that he looks Rodimus in the eyes, as Optimus would have done

Tucson nodds.  And for the first time, even though he could not see from hi=
s eyes, it appears that he looks Rodimus in the eyes, as Optimus would have=
 done with Megatron many years ago.  His expression stoic, as was Optimus P=
rime, and then out of nowhere he gives his reply.

" It doesn't have to com=
e to this, Rodimus, but you leave me with no choice.  One shall rise, and o=
ne shall fall."  

His voice had always sounded like Optimus when he was hi=
s age.  But now, at this moment, it sounded more and more like the legendar=
y Autobot leader.   Now something inside him was coming alive.  A spirit th=
at he had kept deep down within him and now it was emerging. He did not cow=
er in shock at the thought of going toe to toe with Rodimus, although not t=
hrilled with the idea, as Optimus would have felt the same way, going again=
st one of his own, but he knew it had to be done.  Perhaps it was the first=
 step in hopefully recovering his lost leader.

" It's clear to me that you=
 have chosen the same path Megatron chose years ago.  A path that lead to h=
is demise.  So, if this is the path you wish to take, then I fight you as a=
n enemy."

His eyes do not narrow in rage, but take on a look of concentrat=
ion.  He'd need it if he was going to go against Rodimus.

" I'm ready."


=

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>=

> 
> >" Nothing comes easy, and I'm aware of that. I'm not here to take th=
e easy way out. I said I'd do anything it took to restore my leader, and I =
am willing to stand by my pledge, no matter the cost to my own spark. So if=
 it means comming dangerously close to my own mortality, I accept the chall=
enge. I am willing to fight anyone who wishes to challenge me, and I pledge=
 to fight in Warrior's honor." 
> >
> >He waits to find out who will take h=
im up on his offer.
> 
> "Autobot" Scourge's dark=A0tones move across the r=
oom as he watches Tuscon with=A0narrow and dangerous optics,=A0"You stand i=
n the middle of=A0Hydras'=A0throne, sneaking in here=A0like a tubo-rat,=A0a=
ttacking from the back, and you ask us for honor?" 
> 
> Cyclonus nodded, "=
You ask for what you yourself are not ready to give." Cyclonus stepped fowa=
rd, his optics glowing, his hands dropping to his sides and a deceptivly re=
laxed 'ready stance', "Yet if it is a battle you desire, then you shall hav=
e it."
> 
> "NO!" Rodimus' voice barked out as he stepped foward, his optic=
s bright and his weapon ready! "It is me he came for, and it is *I* who wil=
l give him this battle."
> 
> Cyclonus glanced back at Rodimus, the slighte=
st hint of annoyance sketching itself across his face for a moment. 
> 
> "=
Let the boy take him" Scourge said as he stepped nearer to Cyclonus, a sly =
smile appearing on his face, "It will lets us know what he's made of."
> 
>=
 Cyclonus paused for a moment and then nodded, gesturing for Rodimus to ste=
p foward. "He is yours."
> 
> Rodimus, after a slightly=A0worried=A0glance =
at Scourge and then Cyclonus, as if he was only just now realizing somethin=
g, stepped foward to face his new opponant. 
> 
> "I shall give you all the=
 honor you have given us *Autobot!*" He said, That last word comming out al=
most as a curse. With all thoughts of any confusion on his part lost in his=
 readiness for battle the=A0Dark Rodimus=A0gestured to Tuscon, "Come, come =
to your doom!"
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
> (Cyclonus/Scourge/Dark Rodimus)
